field.label: Name
field.help: Provide a name for this tunnel.

field.label: Connection string
field.help: Provide the connection string in the same format as a regular ssh-client connection.

field.label: Interface
field.help: Select the interface to bind this SSH connection to, this is helpful in multi-wan situations connections are required across each individual external connection.

field.label: SSH key name
field.help: Select the SSH key by name to use for this connection.

field.label: Local port forwards
field.help: Provide the local port forward definition in the same format as a regular ssh-client connection.

field.label: Remote port forwards
field.help: Provide the remote port forward definition in the same format as a regular ssh-client connection.

field.label: Description
field.help: Free form text field available to describe this connection if required.
